page.title: 11Games we play in our area
page.content: We take part in many sports in this area but by far the most popular is football.Both of the Primary Schools have football teams and both villages have a senior amateur team who play in the Ross_Shire Amateur League.There is also a team called Maycon ,which is made up of boys under sixteen years from both villages.There are even two teams made up from the patrons of the two local public houses,the Drouthy Duck and the Cottage Bar.Badminton is the most popular of the indoor sports with indoor bowling growing in popularity as well.At school girls play Hockey and Netball while the boys play Shinty and Rounders.Shinty is the game of the Scottish Highlands.In some ways it is like hockey,but the field is much longer and the clubs or "camans" being triangular rather then flat_faced.
